structure.unit: SCHOOL EMPLOYEES -- TEACHERS' RETIREMENT AND TENURE

law.catch_line: Legislative findings and goals on national board certification.

text.section: The General Assembly establishes, on behalf of the public school teachers and students in the Commonwealth, a goal that by the year 2020 there will be at least one (1) national board certified teacher in every public school in Kentucky.

law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 257, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000.
